attributes.action: make a public statement to explain how it is possible that two politicians who are married to each other can claim double payment of an allowance which is available to cover the cost of mortgage interest on a home in the constituency, thereby allowing them to defraud the taxpayer of one of the payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allowances are to cover costs.  If one member of the family claims and pays the mortgage interest allowance what happens to the mortgage interest allowance which is claimed for and paid to the second claimant.  This has got to be theft of taxpayer pounds and all such duplicated allowance claims should be refunded to the public purse.
